content:
It would be great if someone could review the bump from nightly-2023-09-13 to nightly-2023-09-14. The relevant diff is https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/compare/patch-lean-2480..bump-nightly-2023-09-14, and if you're happy with that then delegating #7148 would be great.

This is stacked on top of #6910, which has already been delegated, and is the bump from v4.0.0 to nightly-2023-09-13.

Hopefully tomorrow I will be bringing Mathlib up to a new v4.1.0-rc1.
by the way, when you bump mathlib, don't forget to add lakefile.olean to the gitignore
